### Missing Fields

<!-- Check the boxes for fields that need to be added -->
- [ ] **Video** - YouTube video URL demonstrating proper form
- [ ] **Steps** - Detailed step-by-step instructions
- [ ] **Benefits** - List of benefits and muscle groups targeted
- [ ] **Image** - High-quality image URL showing exercise starting position
- [ ] **Calories** - Estimated calories burned per minute
- [ ] **BPM** - Target heart rate zone for the exercise
- [ ] **Difficulty** - Difficulty level (Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced)
- [ ] **Equipment** - Required equipment specifications

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Video URL is valid and demonstrates proper exercise form
- [ ] Instructions are clear, step-by-step, and comprehensive
- [ ] Benefits list is accurate and informative
- [ ] Image is high-quality and shows proper exercise form
- [ ] All metadata fields are filled with accurate information
- [ ] Data follows existing exercise format and structure

### Quality Guidelines

**Video Requirements:**
- Prefer YouTube videos from reputable fitness channels
- Video should clearly demonstrate proper form
- Include verbal instructions when possible
- Duration: 1-5 minutes recommended

**Image Requirements:**
- High resolution (minimum 800x600)
- Clear visibility of exercise form
- Professional quality
- Shows starting position or key exercise phase

**Instruction Requirements:**
- Use clear, simple language
- Include safety considerations where relevant
- Provide common mistakes to avoid
- Consider beginner-friendly explanations
